Reviews.Content: arrived parkroyal 28th december 2010 honeymoon 11th jan 2011 booked hotel specifically requested honeymoon suite request ignored sandwiched 2 family cue crying babies keeping awake 14 days city view personally ambitious name looks onto apartment block mind bathroom clean modern sort half bath walk shower nice main bit mismatched furniture chips bedside tables repaired looked nail varnish maybe passed wood stain didnt match original colour day stayed hotel 4 afternoon returned hotel hadnt interrupted 3 staff 1 1 check mini bar 1 empty bins forgive im wrong couldnt 1 staff manage day knock door 0800 maid pattern continued entire stay time returned apart day didnt til gone 8 evening days didnt change sheets day foot bled burst blister mark 2 days lack balcony disappointing nice able step outside days didnt wasnt concierge chocolate teapot tickets test match scg told taxi 20 conversation south african doorman revealed bus street catch 2 time concierge family door decided party 0300 promised left guest complain people noise baby music eventually continued racket gone 0500 hotel provide earplugs didnt pass message day staff tell told manager exact words expect seriously wonderful time bellboy decided deliver elses bags discovery looked confused told wrong positive tv offered wide range channels sport stay watch sport day phone calls main desk telling signs door dont disturb privacy please staff sign disturb start day watching english football carry nhl test match finish evening bash situation hotel brilliant darling harbour 2 easy access hotel bar food lovely staff friendly cricket theyre losing dont stay hotel bar summary idea managed 4 rating websites 45 stayed 2 hotels

Reviews.Title: “New brand same tired hotel”
Reviews.Author: simonSussex
Reviews.Content: hotel rebranded park royal little evidence renovation redecoration visit staff customer friendly helpful allocated floor 10 damp musty scruffy dead insects left wardrobe door mouldy fridge recepetion soon resolved issue 9th floor larger brighter bathroom flat screen tvs furniture due change bed comfy slept hotel location darling harbour rocks overall hotel quiet bit tlc free wifi access hotel wrong australian hotels

Reviews.Title: “Crowne Plaza Darling Harbor, now Park Royal”
Reviews.Author: janetdib
Reviews.Content: returned 4 lovely days sydney deal minute secret hotel deal rang hotel night confirm booking issue rang minute onto straight amazement arrived day huge suite loungeroom bedroom king size bed huge bathroom wonderful view darling harbor lovely breeze staff desk concierge helpful smiling hotel 5 mins walk bridge heart darling harbor 10 mins walk city centre 5 mins walk china town central location negative mention furniture update happy recommend hotel definately return

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, with one niggling problem.”
Reviews.Author: kelvincheong
Reviews.Content: australian hotels weve stayed staff courteous professional despite busy week modern clean quiet location easy walkable distance darling harbour chinatown westfield couple bothered airconditioning rattling noises im light sleeper woke adjusted medium setting low overall excellent

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful weekend getway”
Reviews.Author: BeautyandBeast6277
Reviews.Content: purchased tickets bon jovi husband decided 10 wedding anniversary weekend found accommodation minutecom mystery deal price level 1 king size wonderfully spacious clean bed comfortable alot wonderful amenities service desk fantastic negative comment called park royal darling harbour confusing sign formerly crowne plaza darling harbour error minutecom definitely

Reviews.Title: “Now the Park Royal Darling Harbour”
Reviews.Author: Ian_Pratt
Reviews.Content: stayed park royal darling harbour 3 nights hotel reasonably located fringe chinatown city darling harbour walk town hall station 5 6 minutes hotel getting renovated reasonable standard check fast friendly quickly reasonable size standard double beds modern tv decent bathroom couple issues parkroyal firstly extras internet 30day breakfast parking 42day grossly overpriced factor cost booking secondly separate occassions hotel staff burst knocking despite disturb sign door happened hotel bit unsettling time bizzare conversation nonenglish speaking maid inviting service menu time workmen check smoke alarms knock nice overall fair hotel heavily discounted online price workable option sydney stay

Reviews.Title: “Parkroyal At Darling Harbour - no longer the crowne”

Reviews.Content: am change parkroyal earn qantas frequent flyer subsequently wont stay hotels earn shame coz weeks business centre computer dreadfully slow 4 days stayed computer ie slow internet convenience store nearby
